name: I made a bad game with a gnome in it (he has a pogo stick)
name_original: I made a bad game with a gnome in it (he has a pogo stick)
description:
Short 2D platform, where you play as a little gnome. Climb your way to the top!

Commands:

  • A to move left
  • D to move right

I know it's bad, it's even in the title.
